item.title: Intro
item.description: Varicose Veins 静脉曲张 Johns Hopkins https://www.hopkinsmedicine.org/health/conditions-and-diseases/varicose-veins Medical treatment may include: Elevation of the legs. You may be instructed to elevate your feet above the level of your heart 3 or 4 times a day for about 15 minutes at a time. If you need to sit or stand for a long period of time, flexing (bending) your legs occasionally can help keep blood circulating. If you have
